title: Check Capacity for Marketing Launch
description: The marketing team is planning a major launch that will drive significant traffic. SRE needs to confirm the platform can handle the expected load.

tasks.description: Get the expected traffic increase and user load from the marketing team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the forecast (e.g., 5x normal traffic).

tasks.description: Review current utilization of web servers, application servers, and databases.
Based on the forecast and current utilization, pre-scale the infrastructure to handle the expected load before the launch.
